location.address: East Brunswick High School, 380 Cranbury Rd, East Brunswick, NJ

notes.logistics: In-person at East Brunswick High School (380 Cranbury Rd, East Brunswick, NJ). Tournament runs from approximately 9am to 3:30pm. All teams MUST be accompanied by a teacher from their school in order to participate.

format.summary: Fourth annual East Brunswick Science Bowl Invitational Tournament

registration.instructions: Registration is capped at 12 teams. You may register multiple teams from the same school (eg. A and B teams), but if we surpass the 12-team limit, we will prioritize A teams over B teams to increase the number of schools attending. Registration closes on November 23.
registration.cost: $25 per team, with a $5 discount per buzzer system brought (cash payments collected day-of)
